content.title: Create a New Project
content.body:
1. From the main menu, navigate to Project > New Project.
  2. From the What do you want to start with now? window, select Web App.
  3. Click Next.
    The Which device size do you want to start building for first? window appears.
  4. Select Desktop, and then click Next.
    The You started with a Web App. Device size selected is Desktop. window appears.
  5. Under Project Name, enter RecipientsWebApp, and then click Create.
    A new application is created with Form1 form.
    The application opens in the Storyboard view.
